parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the integrated brake controller can cause the loss of trailer brakes, leading to accidents, loss of control, and potential damage to the vehicle and trailer.
symptoms: The trailer brakes disconnect
the truck brakes stop working
the tires begin to smoke
and there is a burning smell from the tires. The warning "No Trailer" appears on the heads-up display.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause the loss of braking ability, leading to accidents, loss of control, and potential damage to the vehicle and occupants.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels extremely loose
the brake pedal travels to the floor without warning
the brakes seize without warning
and the brake caliper becomes tangled in the wheel.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the pre-collision system can cause the vehicle to brake unnecessarily, leading to accidents, loss of control, and potential damage to the vehicle and occupants.
symptoms: The pre-collision system warning and "Brake" warning light come on without reason
and the system fails to function properly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the trailer brake control can lead to loss of control, accidents, or collisions, especially when towing heavy trailers.
symptoms: The trailer brake control fails to recognize the trailer
the trailer brake system does not work
the gain cannot be set initially
the system malfunctions when attached to a trailer or trailer simulator.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the pre-collision system can lead to accidents or collisions, as the system may not engage when needed, putting the driver and passengers at risk.
symptoms: The pre-collision sensor light comes on at various times
the dash reads "pre-collision unavailable"
the system malfunctions without reason
the system does not work when needed
the system cycles on and off to reset but the light stays on.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the PCS can cause the vehicle to accelerate or brake unexpectedly, leading to potential accidents or near-misses, especially when driving at high speeds.
symptoms: The PCS warning light illuminates on the dashboard
the vehicle brakes or accelerates unexpectedly
the cruise control disengages
the trailer brake malfunction warning light is illuminated
and the vehicle may experience sudden de-acceleration.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the dynamic radar-controlled cruise control can cause the vehicle to lose cruise control functionality, leading to potential accidents or driver inconvenience.
symptoms: The cruise control disengages
the PCS warning light illuminates on the dashboard
and the vehicle may experience sudden de-acceleration.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the collision avoidance system can cause the vehicle to accelerate or brake unexpectedly, leading to potential accidents or near-misses, especially when driving at high speeds.
symptoms: The collision avoidance system warning light illuminates on the dashboard
the vehicle accelerates or brakes unexpectedly
and the system may malfunction even when the windshield is clean.
